description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Jun-15 08:03:33

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

FuelCell_SerialNumber.description: The unique serial number of the Fuel Cell currently connected to the telemetry device. It is assumed the telemetry device is mounted to a truck that is powered by the fuel cell.

FuelCell_DateTime_ReFuelStart.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the start of the fuel cell re-fuel summary event.

FuelCell_ReFuelDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of the fuel cell re-fuel summary event.

FuelCell_ReFuelStatus.description: Indicates current Fuel Cell Re-Fueling status.

oneOf.title: NotReFueling
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell is currently not re-fueling.

oneOf.title: ReFueling
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell is currently re-fueling.

oneOf.title: Unavailable
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell re-fueling status is currently unavailable.

oneOf.title: Error
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell re-fueling status is currently in an error condition.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell re-fueling status is currently unknown.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
